page.title: 08HARTPURY SCHOOL
page.content: Hartpury C.E. Primary School is attended by 64 children and has 3 teachers. The main building was built in 1869 and the terrapin in 1963. Situated in the countryside, we are able to study nature around us and the local history.We play football, netball and rounders against schools. We learn to swim at Gloucester Swimming Baths each week.As well as general music lessons, we are able to learn the recorder and clarinet, performing concerts in the Village Hall and local Churches. The Friends of Hartpury School Association organises social events, which raises funds to buy equipment for school as well as contributing to the life of the community.
